Interaction.Name: tutorial_sadie
Interaction.Text: Where is it, again...?
Interaction.TextBox: Tap an item to interact with it

Interaction.Name: examine_hammock
Interaction.Text: No time to sleep now.

Interaction.Name: examine_porthole
Interaction.Text: Beautiful day out today.

Interaction.Name: examine_rag
Interaction.Text: Aha! Just what I needed.
Interaction.TextBox: Drag one item in your inventory on top of another to combine them for a new item!

Interaction.Name: examine_rag
Interaction.Text: I've spent way to much time scrubbing things with rags like this.

Interaction.Name: examine_rag_1
Interaction.Text: But hey, it's part of the job description.

Interaction.Name: use_rag_hook
Interaction.Text: Let's see...

Interaction.Name: cleaned_hook
Interaction.Text: Nice. Now this thing will be on the Captain's wrist before they know it. Better get it to them quick.
Interaction.Speaker: Cabin Girl Sadie

Interaction.Name: examine_tutorial_door
Interaction.Text: I'd better not leave here without the Captain's hook hand.

Interaction.Name: examine_tutorial_door
Interaction.Text: I really need to clean this hook hand first.

Interaction.Name: take_hook_dirty
Interaction.Text: I really shouldn't have left this on the floor...
Interaction.TextBox: Tap an item to examine it

Interaction.Name: examine_hook_dirty
Interaction.Text: The Captain's hook hand. I was supposed to clean it... last night. Oops.

Interaction.Name: examine_hook
Interaction.Text: The Captain's hook hand, all clean and shiny.

Interaction.Name: default_bottle
Interaction.Text: I can't reach it.

Interaction.Name: examine_bottle
Interaction.Text: Bullseye.

Interaction.Name: throw_orange
Interaction.Text: When you're short, you gotta improvise.

Interaction.Name: examine_orange
Interaction.Text: No scurvy here.

Interaction.Name: take_orange_fail
Interaction.Text: I really need to find the Captain's hook hand...

Interaction.Name: take_orange
Interaction.Text: Ah, an orange. A pirate's best friend.

Interaction.Name: take_orange_1
Interaction.Text: And not a bad projectile in a pinch.
Interaction.TextBox: Drag and drop an item from your inventory onto an object in the world to attempt to use it

Interaction.Name: examine_mop_head
Interaction.Text: Hello again, old friend.

Interaction.Name: examine_mop_head
Interaction.Text: An inky mop. Talk about counterproductive.

Interaction.Name: examine_ink
Interaction.Text: Eugh.

Interaction.Name: use_mop_ink
Interaction.Text: Ick. That just made the mop all inky.

Interaction.Name: use_mop_ink_again
Interaction.Text: I don’t ink so. Haha.

Interaction.Name: examine_mop_handle
Interaction.Text: You’re kidding. I can’t handle this.

Interaction.Name: use_mop_head_handle
Interaction.Text: It's beyond repair.

Interaction.Name: examine_barrel
Interaction.Text: Nothing useful in there.

Interaction.Name: examine_cannon
Interaction.Text: Boom.

Interaction.Name: swabbie_response
Interaction.Text: Can’t complain. Much.

Interaction.Name: give_firstmate_hook
Interaction.Text: He's already got a hook hand.

Interaction.Name: give_firstmate_hook_1
Interaction.Text: Better think of something else.

Interaction.Name: examine_lifeboat
Interaction.Text: Doesn’t look very safe.

Interaction.Name: examine_lifeboat
Interaction.Text: Looks like it could save lives.

Interaction.Name: use_rope_lifeboat
Interaction.Text: Workplace safety is paramount. They’ll be thanking me come inspection day.

Interaction.Name: examine_rope
Interaction.Text: Can’t get enough rope - ahem - I mean, line on a ship.

Interaction.Name: use_hook_handle
Interaction.Text: Neat. Now it's long AND grabby.

Interaction.Name: examine_chalkboard
Interaction.Text: Better not mess with it.

Interaction.Name: examine_chalkboard
Interaction.Text: Maybe I'll just borrow this chalk here.

Interaction.Name: use_chalk_poster
Interaction.Text: Let’s just scribble some stink lines...

Interaction.Name: use_chalk_poster_1
Interaction.Text: Heh. Classic.

Interaction.Name: use_chalk_poster
Interaction.Text: I'd love to spend all day messing with it -

Interaction.Name: use_chalk_poster
Interaction.Text: I'd love to spend all day messing with them -

Interaction.Name: use_chalk_poster_2
Interaction.Text: But I have more important things to do.

Interaction.Name: use_chalk_chalkboard
Interaction.Text: Believe it or not, I can read.

Interaction.Name: examine_chalk
Interaction.Text: No sidewalks to draw on up here.

Interaction.Name: examine_pole_hook
Interaction.Text: What was the point of this again?

Interaction.Name: examine_lantern
Interaction.Text: It's pretty far up.

Interaction.Name: examine_lantern
Interaction.Text: It's lit.

Interaction.Name: use_pole_lantern
Interaction.Text: Not quite long enough.

Interaction.Name: examine_poster
Interaction.Text: I think he spelled his own name wrong...

Interaction.Name: posters_given
Interaction.Text: That looks like all of them. Better let Bart know.

Interaction.Name: give_poster_again
Interaction.Text: They already have one of these.

Interaction.Name: talk_rigger
Interaction.Text: She's up pretty high. I probably shouldn't bother her.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotUse
Interaction.Text: I don't want to stab that.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotUse
Interaction.Text: Clean something I don't have to? No way.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotUse
Interaction.Text: They didn’t recruit me to be an artist, that’s for sure.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotUse
Interaction.Text: Nah.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotGive
Interaction.Text: I don't think they'd want that.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotGive
Interaction.Text: I'd really rather hold on to it.

Interaction.Name: DefaultCannotGive
Interaction.Text: Wait. I should be giving these to people who actually matter.
